src:
Jelang Fuzhou China Open 2019, The Daddies Fokus Jaga Kondisi
04 Nov 2019, 20:28 by Anggi Tiar


Jelang Fuzhou China Open 2019, The Daddies Fokus Jaga Kondisi

KBRN, Jakarta : Pasangan ganda putra Indonesia, Hendra Setiawan/Mohammad Ahsan bakal berlaga di Fuzhou China Open 2019. Dalam turnamen level Super 750 itu, pasangan yang dijuluki The Daddies lebih menjaga kondisi tubuh dibanding mempersiapkan diri serta strategi permainan. Bagaimana tidak, di usianya yang terbilang sudah tidak muda lagi, The Daddies baru saja mengikuti kejuaraan Eropa beruntun pekan lalu di Denmark Open dan French Open 2019. Hendra/Ahsan pun kabarnya hanya mengikuti latihan selama empat hari sebelum Fuzhou China Open 2019 ini. "Tentunya lelah, tapi kan lawan juga sama. Stamina pasti menurun, apalagi kami sudah nggak muda lagi, jadi recovery-nya nggak bisa secepat dulu. Setelah dari Eropa sempat ada jet lag juga, jadi sekarang harus pintar jaga kondisi, jangan sampai sakit atau cedera," ungkap Hendra seperti dikutip situs resmi PBSI, Senin (4/11/2019).Di ajang Fuzhou Open 2019 ini, Hendra/Ahsan tidak sendiri turun di sektor ganda putra. Ya, Indonesia menurunkan tiga pasangan lainnya pada ajang yang bakal bergulir mulai Selasa (5/11/2019) besok hingga Minggu (11/11/2019) mendatang tersebut. Ketiga pasangan lainnya selain Hendra/Ahsan itu adalah, Kevin Sanjaya Sukamuljo/Marcus Fernaldi Gideon, Fajar Alfian/Muhammad Rian Ardianto dan Wahyu Nayaka Arya Pankaryanira/Ade Yusuf Santoso.
text:
Ahead of the Fuzhou China Open 2019, The Daddies Focus on Maintaining Conditions
Nov 04 2019, 20:28 by Anggi Tiar


Ahead of the Fuzhou China Open 2019, The Daddies Focus on Maintaining Conditions

KBRN, Jakarta: Indonesian men's doubles partner, Hendra Setiawan / Mohammad Ahsan will compete at the 2019 China Open Fuzhou. In the Super 750 level tournament, the pair nicknamed The Daddies are more likely to maintain their body condition than to prepare themselves and to play the game strategy. How could I not, at a relatively young age, The Daddies had just joined the European Championship in a row last week at the Danish Open and the French Open 2019. Hendra / Ahsan was reportedly only taking part in training for four days before the Fuzhou China Open 2019. "Certainly tired, but the opponent is also the same. Stamina must decrease, especially since we are not young anymore, so the recovery cannot be as fast as before. After from Europe there was jet lag too, so now we have to be smart to protect the condition, not to get sick or injury, "Hendra said as quoted by the PBSI official website on Monday (11/04/2019). In the 2019 Fuzhou Open event, Hendra / Ahsan did not go down in the men's doubles sector. Yes, Indonesia sent down three other couples at the event that will roll from Tuesday (11/5/2019) tomorrow to Sunday (11/11/2019). The other three couples besides Hendra / Ahsan are Kevin Sanjaya Sukamuljo / Marcus Fernaldi Gideon, Fajar Alfian / Muhammad Rian Ardianto and Wahyu Nayaka Arya Pankaryanira / Ade Yusuf Santoso.
